name: Jesse Blum
text: It's so good I will give it 5 stars. The last two times I got regular crust instead of thin crust which I never order nor did I want regular crust. They still get 5 stars from me though bc everyone is always friendly there. They are always fresh, and honestly the best deal us with just a medium pizza you get a free rental so score haha.

name: Tasha Pate
text: Absolutely love their food, nothing I don't like from here! Would recommend this restaurant over many other places in town, and they deliver. Good prices, nice staff. And they are connected with family video and can deliver movies with ordering food as well. Good deal!

name: Erica Suzda
text: Pizzas are unique and taste awesome. The service is always spot on - plus you can get a free movie (even new releases) with your delivery order! What's not awesome about that? I love getting food from Marcos because of the "dinner and a movie" delivery!

name: Patrick Anthony
text:
I've had pizza here a couple of times and it's not bad.
For me it's always been to take home, the sauce is alright the pizza was good but what's even better. Is the coupons and Deals you get for either Pizza or â€¦More

name: North Meets South
text: We LOVE Marco's! Their pizzas are always so good. The thin crust is the best. The service is fast and friendly. Marco's is the only pizza place for us.

name: Ann Donegan
text: I ordered 4 pizzas at 11am to be delivered at noon today. I called at 12:06. The gentleman answered and said they got busy. Very poor excuse. They need to budget there time better. Now our luncheon meeting is running late and I have 10 starving employees.  Marco's is very undependable for time.

name: Kerrell Ankerman
text: Great pizza and the staff is amazing. The quality exceeds your competitors. We enjoy and we tell others

name: Kelly Munguia
text: Called in and order the person answered the phone friendly and knowledgeable of the menu. He gave me choices and was very nice. He is a keeper. The food came half an hour later the delivery driver was very friendly as well! Great food Great service! Great start for Marco's!

name: Tabitha Erlandson
text: Love the pizza and subs!!! So yummy I highly recommended their food. It's truly high quality.

name: Admiral Talax
text: Ok pizza but the prices are higher than other places that offer a better tasting pizza.

name: Kim Barton
text: Good pizza at a competitive price. Nice to have options other then the normal TV commercial places.

name: Hannah Hoyt
text: I got half of what I ordered online and still got charged the full price. I got shorted an entire pizza. What I ordered online did not even close to match what I actually received. Customer service in the store would do absolutely nothing about it. Will never order again.

name: Andy Nelson
text: Very good pizza, although a little pricey. Worth it though, if you are willing to spend that kind of money.

name: Bill Collins
text: Great pizza and they always get the order up fast. The one time they made a mistake on my order they fixed it no questions asked. This pizza costs a little more than some, but you really get your money's worth here.

name: Zach Bornemann
text: Good pizza. Decent service. Was given to us in a timely manner and was actually pretty good.

name: Briana Arndt
text: We ordered food about a week ago. It came 15 minutes early which was fine if the food was thoroughly cooked. I received a meatball sub half frozen in the middle cold cheese and slapped with sauce all over the bags the sandwich was a cold â€¦More

name: Holly Reany
text: Have not eaten there yet & will not be eating there. Just called to place an order for delivery since.We received coupons in the mail for them. Gave them my address & they claimed they don't deliver outside a three mile radius around their â€¦More

name: Gracelyn Eastmand
text: The pizza was so good. Was so impressed with the service and the friendly staff.

name: Elizabeth Bowen
text: Love thier pizza.....I have only had a late delivery once and when I did they had called me to let me know and gave me a free pizza coupon to use next time. They also delivery movie rentals with your pizza which is great for family night.

name: John Senn
text: Happy helpful people did a great job helping me  finding the pizza I wanted .they did a A-1 job.

name: Tracey Enerson
text: Food was great. Staff complaining about their shifts and other stuff loudly was a big turn off. One was a manager as well. Very unprofessional.

name: William Pearson
text: "Good food an ðŸ”¥,more chicken for the money!!...

name: Angela Koch
text: Worst.pizza.EVER! We have ordered Marcos 3x's and each time it's been worse. Today was the tipping point for me the pizza was so greasy that I tipped it sideways and the grease dripped off and then I blotted it with a napkin, yuk!! Not much flavor, and our "cheese" bread sticks had very little cheese and was burnt. Never again! Horrible

name: Sheri Becker
text: Like the pizza very much. I like that you can pretty much make your own. Price was very reasonable.

name: Candace Mantsu
text: The best pizza in town! Friendly and helpful staff!

name: Julie Ann H
text: Salad was great. And cheesy bread want not over cooked or greasy

name: Sandra LaBarre
text: The poor girl was running the whole thing all by herself the order took forever and someone order over the phone 20min ago came to pick it up and the order wasn't even in process yet, the girl had an admit adituit big time. Thumps down but great pizza!

name: Debbie Helke
text: I tried to order a Italian sandwich, but was told they were out if salami. An Italian pizza place with no salami. Disappointed. Other food was fine though.

name: Greg Hamite
text: I travel through here often for work. Love getting this delivered itâ€™s the best around.

name: Jared Shartain
text: Great pizza great staff!

name: Em V
text: The best pizza I've ever eaten and great delivery

name: Wendy Montag
text: Getting a free movie rental with your meal is a great idea.

name: Joshua Yanta
text: Good pizza and subs. I get text coupons straight to my phone.

name: Laura Van Tassel
text: The crust toppings just take it to another level....Love this pizza!

name: Joseph Palm
text: Fast service very good pizza thank you very much Andy the shift manager

name: bob q
text: If you want a good ass pizza this is the place!! Good prices too;)

name: Felicia Kaufman
text: Great food! Delivery time is always 30 mins but they deliver in 20 mins every time! Love that you can have your movies delivered or they take movies back for you! Will be using this pizza place over all the other ones in wis Rapids!

name: Amber Anderson
text: We ordered a small meat supremo with Roma crust for pick up. At the Marcos in Wisconsin Rapids. (This is the 4th time eating there in a month) upon arrival they had accidentally made us the delux uno. The manager there Brooke was extremely â€¦More

name: Steven Koth
text: One of my favorite pizza places in town.

name: Matthew Hayek
text: Really good, service is really nice, and pizza way better than I expected.

text: I would stop again and again, very good service.

text: Great thin crust pizza. Free movie rental with a $10 purchase.

text: The best pizza joint in town!

name: If not now WHEN

name: Sally Siems
text: Very friendly staff took time to tell us our options.  Pizza was fast and really good.
